entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
